Title: Learn from the elder brother-worker
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe (华东人民美术出版社), Shanghai
Notes: Agricultural model workers visit Shanghai Steel Plant no. 3.The slogan on the banner on the right: Welcome to the agricultural model workers from the old liberated areas to visit the Shanghai Steel Plant - 歡迎老解放區農業劳模參觀上海煉鋼廠. In the background, on the left: Patriotic labor competition - 愛國主義勞動競賽.
